questions.question_text:
You want to update the font of an entire workbook.

What should you use to configure the default fonts?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
CD is correct

questions.question_text: Which two elements can have their values changed by using a dashboard action? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
Agreed, continuous field is shown as green pill and a quantitative axis.

Selected Answer: AC
continuous field is shown as green pill and an axis.

Selected Answer: AC
AC es correcto

I converted my date dimension to continuous and then drag to the row shelf; it was green. 
I will go for the AC Option.

If you drag a date without modifying anything, the pill is blue, so BC
If you drag and select a continuous version of your date, the pill is green, so AC
Tricky question

comments.content: Continuous is treated as a continuous, quantitative value. If it were "discrete", it would be treated as a Dimension, but that's not the question.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
BC is correct. Since you've dragged a continuous date value, it's treated as a dimension, so the pill color is blue.

questions.question_text: What are two outcomes when you drag a continuous date value to the Rows shelf? (Choose two.)

choices.D: The date part is displayed as labels.
choices.A: The pill on the Rows shelf is green.
choices.B: The pill on the Rows shelf is blue.

questions.question_text:
You want to use visual clusters to show data trends on a map.

Which type of map should you use?

You need to share a workbook with a user who does NOT have access to the underlying data. The user must be able to modify existing visualizations.

What should you do?

comments.content: the user should not have access to data

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct

choices.C: Save the workbook as a .twb file.
choices.B: Save the workbook as a .twbx file.
